response.overview: Pack your sense of adventure (and your best puns) for a “world famous” river journey through the wild beauties of the Jungle and legendary one-liners! The Jungle Cruise sets sail in this Point of View ride-along down a "treacherous" river where ancient ruins, wisecracking skippers, and bathing Indian elephants await you. But don't worry, they have their trunks on. In honor of the Disneyland® Resort 70th Celebration, relive one of Walt's original attractions, proving that great jokes and our love for adventure never grows old. Trust your skipper. They've only been lost once. Today.
response.tagline: Wild animals and puns. Take a Point of View ride down the river that launched a thousand dad jokes.
response.title: Jungle Cruise | Disneyland Resort
